text: Oh nice! I'm doing Biology, Chemistry and Maths for my a levels. I'm guessing you also did maths which from what I've heard means that there are a number of career paths you can go into with it which was one of the reasons I chose it. Another thing that I wanted to ask was what extra curricular activities would I be able to do to prove that I have leadership skills? I know they are important regardless of career choice. How did you portray leadership skills at my age as a year 12 student?

Yes I did maths, was my favourite a-level actually !.... So do you play any sport ? Because I ran team events and worked as a county in tournaments etc. This is something that is still on my cv to show leadership and teamwork.
